description:
An incredibly warm foundation for cold-weather layering from the ski hill to the snowshoe trail, the 260 Tech Long Sleeve Crewe features soft and breathable 100% merino wool jersey fabric. A warmer version of icebreaker’s best-selling Oasis, the 260 Tech offers ample insulation and naturally resists odors while its half-zip design makes for easy layering and temperature regulation. Gusseted underarms, backward set side seams and offset shoulder seams improve range of motion and prevent chafing.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Merino 260 Tech LS Half Zip - Mens
